abstract: Stocks fall slightly following their best week so far in 2015.
lead_paragraph: Stocks wobbled in afternoon trading as the market comes off its biggest weekly gain of the year. Pfizer and Allergan slipped after announcing a merger deal.

headline.main: After Banner Week, Market Noses Back Down
headline.print_headline: Market Pauses After Its Best Week of the Year

snippet: Stocks wobbled in afternoon trading as the market comes off its biggest weekly gain of the year. Pfizer and Allergan slipped after announcing a merger deal.
